name: BMW 7 Series
description: The BMW 7 Series is a luxury full-size sedan produced by the German automaker BMW. It is known for its combination of advanced technology, luxury, performance, and innovative features.
design_and_styling_features: Sleek and elegant design with a prominent kidney grille, LED headlights, and a distinctive profile. Available in standard and long-wheelbase versions.
engine_options_range: Various engine options, including inline-6, V8, and V12 engines. Plug-in hybrid variants for improved fuel efficiency.
technology_safety_features: Advanced driver-assistance features like adaptive cruise control, lane-keeping assist, and automated parking.
luxury_and_comfort_features: Includes features like rear-seat entertainment systems, rear-seat executive packages with enhanced rear-seat amenities, and adjustable rear seats for a first-class experience.

name: BMW M8
description: The BMW i8 is a hybrid sports car that combines a futuristic design with sustainable technology. It's a plug-in hybrid with an electric motor and a turbocharged three-cylinder engine for impressive performance.
design_and_styling_features: A striking and aerodynamic design with butterfly doors, LED headlights, and a futuristic interior. Available as a coupe and roadster.
engine_options_range: Features a plug-in hybrid powertrain with an electric motor and a turbocharged three-cylinder engine. Capable of electric-only driving and impressive acceleration.
technology_safety_features: Comes with advanced technology, including an iDrive infotainment system, driver assistance features, and eDrive mode for electric driving.
luxury_and_comfort_features: Offers a sporty and upscale interior with leather seats, carbon fiber accents, and a driver-focused cockpit.

name: BMW X7
description: The BMW X7 is a luxury SUV that offers a combination of spaciousness, opulence, and advanced technology. It's designed for those seeking a large and luxurious vehicle for family or executive transportation.
design_and_styling_features: Impressive and imposing design with a large double-kidney grille, distinctive headlights, and a spacious interior. Available in standard and M Performance versions.
engine_options_range: Offers a range of powerful engines, including inline-6, V8, and a high-performance V8 in the M50i model. Optional air suspension for a smooth ride.
technology_safety_features: Equipped with advanced technology, including a large infotainment system, driver assistance features, and available off-road capabilities.
luxury_and_comfort_features: Spacious and luxurious interior with three rows of seating, premium materials, and various comfort and convenience features.

name: BMW i8
description: The BMW i8 is a hybrid sports car that combines a futuristic design with sustainable technology. It's a plug-in hybrid with an electric motor and a turbocharged three-cylinder engine for impressive performance.
design_and_styling_features: A striking and aerodynamic design with butterfly doors, LED headlights, and a futuristic interior. Available as a coupe and roadster.
engine_options_range: Features a plug-in hybrid powertrain with an electric motor and a turbocharged three-cylinder engine. Capable of electric-only driving and impressive acceleration.
technology_safety_features: Comes with advanced technology, including an iDrive infotainment system, driver assistance features, and eDrive mode for electric driving.
luxury_and_comfort_features: Offers a sporty and upscale interior with leather seats, carbon fiber accents, and a driver-focused cockpit.
